name: Don't Chat With Strangers
descr:
Don't Chat With Strangers is a hard-to-describe-sort-of-horror-permadeath-puzzle-game mostly taking place in a single room.

The main character in the middle of the night is approached by a strange girl in an online chat. It quickly turns out that he is in grave danger - the player's task is either to survive and find out why the girl is bugging the protagonist, or kill the main character in a multitude of different ways.

[b]In DCWS you will[/b]
[list][li]chat with a virtual stranger (by selecting replies from predetermined phrases)
[/li][li]play computer games in a computer in a computer game in your computer
[/li][li]click on a few things in your room to do stuff (as in point and click adventure games)
[/li][li]have to think a little if you want to complete the game
[/li][li]get spooked a little
[/li][li]die multiple times in multiple various ways[/li][/list]
detail:
名称: Don't Chat With Strangers
类型: 独立
开发商: Bartosz Bojarowski
发行商: Bartosz Bojarowski
发行日期: 2017 年 1 月 6 日
review: 全部评测: 褒贬不一 (140) - 此游戏的 140 篇用户评测中有 47% 为好评。
全部评测: 褒贬不一 (140 篇中的 47%) 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统: XP
处理器: 2.5 GHz
内存: 2 GB RAM
显卡: integrated GC with OpenGL support
存储空间: 需要 150 MB 可用空间
